• golangPoint.com

Frameworks for Golang

1. Beego

Beego is Open Source, high performance framwork for go programming.

Beego Framework has many features.Such as
  • Restful support
  • MVC Model
  • Automated testing
  • Automated packing and deploying
  • ORM supporting
    • and etc...

2. Gin Gonic

Gin is a web framwork written in Golang. It features a martini like API with give much better performance and give up to 40 times faster. If you have knowledge of Martini than you can learn gin in 10 minutes.

Gin Gonic is a minimalistic Framework that includes only the libraries and features. This makes it perfect for developing high performance Rest API. Which is 40 times faster thanks to httprouter. If you need performance and good productivity, you will love Gin.

You can add Radix tree based routing,small memory foot print, No reflection, Predictable API performance, middleware, JSON validation, Routes grouping, Error management, Rendering builtin, Extendable and etc...

3. Buffalo

Buffalo is Go web development Framework that easy to start and learn and is designed to make the life of a Go web developer easier.

Buffalo helps you to generate a web project that already has everything setup for you from front-end(Javascript, SCSS, etc.) to back-end (database, routing, etc) development and everything already hooked up and ready to run.

4. Revel

Revel is high productivity Framework for Go, It have reuseable MVC Components.
Revel Provide
Routing, Parameter Parsing, Template Engine, Revel Mux, Validation, Session/Flash, Caching, Job Running, Testing Framework , Even Internationalization and etc...

5. IRIS

The fastest backend web Framework for Go. There are many features of IRIS Framework. Those are:-
Crossplateform
Write one and run anywhere ie, Android, IOS, Linux and Windows etc. with the minimum machine power, It is backed on Google Go, Only one excutable server on all plateforms.
Easy To Use
IRIS know for simple and powerful api. It's the only one Go Framework with rich support of the MVC Architectural Pattern with near zero performance cost.
Microservices
It's easy to build Microservices with IRIS.

6. Echo

Echo is high performance, minimalist Go web Framework. There are many features of Echo Framework. Those are:-
Optimizer Router
Highly Optimized HTTP router with zero dynamic memory allocation.
Scalable
build robust and Scalable Restful api and easily organized inti groups.
Automatic TLS
Automatically install TLS certificates from Let's Encrypt.
HTTP/2
It Support HTTP/2. Improves speed and provides better user experiencec.
Templates
Use any template engine.
Other features
Middleware, Data Binding, Data Rendering, Extensible and etc...

7. Gem Web Framework

Gem is a simple and fast web Framework written in Go. Gin is user-friendly to Rest API. It support HTTP/2 with go1.8version. It frequently used middlewares
Features
  • High performance
  • User-Friendly to Rest API
  • Pretty and fast router(httprouter)
  • HTTP/2 support
  • Use Middleware
    • CORS Middleware
    • AUTH Middleware
    • JWT Middleware
    • Request Body Limit Middleware
    • Rate Limiting Middleware
    • CSRF Middleware
  • Frozen APIs
    • etc...
There are many Frameworks and libraries but I don't want to cover to cover now. you can see more Frameworks latter.
